rawData.description: Notion template for people who are doing 100 Days of code challenge. record and track your progress with ease.Features Progress bar to display your progress. Pages for all 100 days already created. Quick links to useful websites. FAQDoes this work on the free version of Notion?Yes. How to download this template?Go to the template page, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner to duplicate it to your workspace.Any other questions?You can contact me on twitter @tonydavidz
features: Progress bar to display your progress.
Pages for all 100 days already created.

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive Notion workspace designed to support developers undertaking the popular 100 Days of Code challenge. This template provides structured daily logging, visual progress tracking, and curated resources to maintain momentum throughout your coding journey.

features: Visual progress indicator showing completion percentage
Pre-built individual pages for each of the 100 days

problemsSolved: Difficulty maintaining consistency during long-term coding challenges
Lack of structured system to document daily coding progress
Scattered resources and tools across different platforms
solutionsBenefits: Maintains motivation through visual progress indicators and daily structure
Creates a comprehensive record of your learning journey with dedicated daily pages
Centralizes essential coding resources and tools in one accessible location
idealFor: Beginner developers starting their coding journey
Developers participating in coding challenges or bootcamps
notRecommendedFor: Experienced developers who prefer minimal tracking (may be too structured)
Users who don't use Notion regularly (learning curve may interfere with focus)
whatsIncluded: Complete 100-day template structure with pre-created pages
Resource library with developer tools and learning links

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, once duplicated to your workspace, you can modify the daily page layouts, add custom fields, and adjust the resource links to match your learning goals.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion plan including the free version. No premium features are required for core functionality.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Setup is minimal - simply duplicate the template to your workspace and start using immediately. All 100 daily pages are pre-configured.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template structure is evergreen and compatible with current Notion features, though resource links may need periodic updates.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: You can reach out to the creator on Twitter @tonydavidz for questions about template usage or customization.
